WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is an interesting concept but given our intention to make Typescript easily accessible to existing JavaScript programmers and the patterns they know I don't see something as different as this fitting into our plans any time soon.
WorkItem.Description:
[Literate Programming](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Literate_programming) is a new approach to programming by combining markdown documentation and code to be both compilable and human readable. Like Literate CoffeeScript http://ashkenas.com/literate-coffeescript

See also: http://www.literateprogramming.com/
WorkItem.Summary: Feature Suggestion: Literate Programming for TypeScript
